messages_delete_confirm: Are your sure you want to delete this file?
messages_delete_confirm_permanent: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this(these) message(s)?
messages_restore_confirm: Are you sure you want to restore this(these) message(s)?

empty_unread_help: When you receive a message, it will appear here
